title: AI Show | Nov 5 | Ignite Recap | Arc Enabled ML
description:
In this Ignite recap episode Bozhong Lin joins Bea Stollnitz to show us how easy it is to enable an existing Kubernetes cluster for Azure ML! He'll demo how to safely rollout a model with blue/green deployment on premise on Kubernetes! https://aka.ms/ArcMLDocs

Jump to:
00:00 Episode begins
00:23 Bea welcomes Bozhong Lin
01:14 Azure Arc Enabled ML for Inference - Ignite announcement
02:02 What is Azure Arc Enabled ML
03:00 Why having models on premise is a good thing
06:09 Who will use it
07:05 Demo - safely rollout a model with blue/green deployment on premise on Kubernetes
18:25 Managed online endpoints vs. Kubernetes online endpoints
